settings.title: Tag Group Manager settings
settings.selectAtLeastOneTag: Please select at least one tag
settings.deleteGroupConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this group?
settings.tip1: Find the star icon in the left sidebar and click it to open the sort/insert quick page in the right sidebar area.
settings.tip2: Switch between sort/insert modes by clicking on tag group names. Drag handles appear above tag group names only in sort mode for reordering.
settings.tip3: After adding new tags to a tag group in settings, you need to click the tag group name to refresh and display them.
settings.tip4: You must be in an editable view to invoke individual tag group commands from the command palette.
settings.tip5: After adding new tags to a tag group in settings, shift+click the cycle icon in the floating tag selector to refresh.
settings.tip6: In non-cycle mode, tags become grayed out after being inserted once, making it ideal for selective insertion scenarios with a defined tag scope.
settings.languageAutoDetected: Language automatically detected based on Obsidian's language settings
settings.enableCustomColorsDesc: Set custom colors for different tags, supports regex matching
settings.colorMappingDesc: Set custom colors for tags. Supports exact matching and regex matching.
settings.addColorMappingDesc: Add color mapping for tag names or regex patterns
settings.useRegexDesc: Enable to treat pattern as regex

overview.title: Tag overview
overview.insertModeTitle: Insert mode - click tags to insert
overview.doubleClickToSwitch: Double-click to switch between insert and sort modes

commands.insertHere: Please click on the tag to insert

messages.duplicateTag: Tag already exists in this group
messages.noEditorFound: No editor found, please open a document first
messages.openMarkdownFirst: Please open a Markdown document and place the cursor at the insertion point
messages.tagGroupUpdated: Tag group updated, added {count} new tags
messages.tagGroupUpToDate: Tag group is up to date

messages.cycleButtonTooltip1: Cyclic mode: enabled â€” click to turn off cyclic mode. Shift+click to update the tag list from the tag group.
messages.cycleButtonTooltip2: Cyclic mode: off â€” click to turn on cyclic mode to restore all tags. Shift+click to update the tag list from the tag group.
